insight: In player messages (join/quit/death/timed), `then` operators like `then discord`, `then console`, `then log`, and `then write` historically required at least one online receiver to execute because the filter loop iterates over online players. A fix was added so these sender-only operators now run via a fallback path even when no receivers are present (e.g., last player quitting). If a user reports these operators not firing on quit with no other players online, they need to update.
